oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Oath of Office for Mayor Beverly Briley, April 1, 1963
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Oath of Office for Mayor Beverly Briley, the first mayor of The Metropolitan Government of Nashville and Davidson County. Metro Government was the first consolidation of a city and a county government in the nation. 8 x 10 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Briley, Beverly; Tomlinson, Pride
Mayors;
Nashville (Tenn.)
